import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/authentication.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { currentUser: any = null; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit() { const userId = localStorage.getItem('userId'); if (userId) { this.fetchUserDetails(userId); } else { console.error('User ID not found in local storage'); } } private fetchUserDetails(userId: string) { this.authService.getUserDetails(+userId).subscribe({ next: (user) => { this.currentUser = user; console.log('Current user:', this.currentUser); }, error: (err) => { console.error('Error fetching user details:', err); } }); } get isAuthenticated(): boolean { return this.authService.isAuthenticated(); } logout() { this.authService.logout(); } }
